notes.text:
This update for eog fixes the following issues:

- out-of-bounds write in eog (bsc#994819, CVE-2016-6855)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Eye of GNOME (aka eog) 3.16.5, 3.17.x, 3.18.x before 3.18.3, 3.19.x, and 3.20.x before 3.20.4, when used with glib before 2.44.1, allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write and crash) via vectors involving passing invalid UTF-8 to GMarkup.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
